overview: The First Showcase Series welcoming back the very popular Blue Angel! Blue Angel and Kai Taylor are heating up the dance floor as they press their bodies close, exchanging inviting looks. The pulsing lights drive the desire coursing through them, and it isn't long before Blue takes Kai's hand to steal him away to somewhere more private. She is lounging topless in her luxurious rooftop garden, lazily applying lotion while soaking in the warm sun when her boyfriend, Kristof Cale, happens across her and is captivated by the sight. The way the sunlight shines off her glistening skin has him hooked. The music, dim lights, and people seducing each other from across the room... Even though Blue Angel herself is there with her date, Erik Everhard, another man, Gerson, catches her eye. She certainly loves her gold-star lesbian girlfriend, Rebecca Volpetti, but Blue fantasizes about having a threesome with a guy just like Chris Diamond.
title: An Angel in Blue
